title: Ticket #6621: condor_userprio shows 0 resources used when preemption disabled
description:
fermi reports condor_userprio shows 0 resources used for all active users, even though they are clearly running jobs.

Turns out the problem only happens when

NEGOTIATOR_CONSIDER_PREEMPTION = false

is set. In 8.7.3, the MyType attribute in class ads is now first class, and the projection code with NEGOTIATOR_CONSIDER_PREEMPTION=False needs to explicitly add it in.
remarks:
2018-Apr-25 11:50:52 by gthain:
As a result of this bug, when NEGOTIATOR_CONSIDER_PREEMPTION is false, the negotiator, and thus the accountant, have zero numbers on claimed resources. This is likely to cause problems for accounting, fair-share, and group accounting.
check_ins:
2018-Mar-26 16:45   Check-in [54578]: Documetn #6621 (By Greg Thain )
2018-Mar-22 17:38   Check-in [54566]: Allow condor_userprio to work with preemption disabled #6621 By adding MyType to the projection (By Greg Thain )
creator: gthain
